db:abstract.db:para: The QSGImageNode class is provided for convenience to easily draw textured content using the QML scene graph.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:warning.db:para: The image node class must have a texture before being added to the scene graph to be rendered.

db:section.db:title: enum QSGImageNode::TextureCoordinatesTransformFlag
db:section.db:para: The TextureCoordinatesTransformFlag enum is used to specify the mode used to generate texture coordinates for a textured quad.

db:td.db:para: Texture coordinates are oriented with window coordinates i.e. with origin at top-left.
Texture coordinates are inverted in the horizontal axis with respect to window coordinates
Texture coordinates are inverted in the vertical axis with respect to window coordinates

db:section.db:para: The TextureCoordinatesTransformMode type is a typedef for QFlags<TextureCoordinatesTransformFlag>. It stores an OR combination of TextureCoordinatesTransformFlag values.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QSGTexture::Filtering QSGImageNode::filtering() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the filtering for this image node.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QSGTexture::Filtering QSGImageNode::mipmapFiltering() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the mipmap filtering for this image node.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QSGImageNode::ownsTexture() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the node takes ownership of the texture; otherwise false.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QRectF QSGImageNode::rect() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the target rect of this image node.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QSGImageNode::setFiltering(QSGTexture::Filtering filtering)
db:section.db:para: Sets the filtering to be used for this image node to filtering.
For smooth scaling, use QSGTexture::Linear. For normal scaling, use QSGTexture::Nearest.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QSGImageNode::setMipmapFiltering(QSGTexture::Filtering filtering)
db:section.db:para: Sets the mipmap filtering to be used for this image node to filtering.
For smooth scaling between mip maps, use QSGTexture::Linear. For normal scaling, use QSGTexture::Nearest.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QSGImageNode::setOwnsTexture(bool owns)
db:section.db:para: Sets whether the node takes ownership of the texture to owns.
By default, the node does not take ownership of the texture.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QSGImageNode::setRect(const QRectF &rect)
db:section.db:para: Sets the target rect of this image node to rect.

db:section.db:title: void QSGImageNode::setRect(qreal x, qreal y, qreal w, qreal h)
db:section.db:para: This is an overloaded function.
Sets the rectangle of this image node to begin at (x, y) and have width w and height h.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QSGImageNode::setSourceRect(const QRectF &rect)
db:section.db:para: Sets the source rect of this image node to rect.

db:section.db:title: void QSGImageNode::setSourceRect(qreal x, qreal y, qreal w, qreal h)
db:section.db:para: This is an overloaded function.
Sets the rectangle of this image node to show its texture from (x, y) and have width w and height h relatively to the QSGTexture::textureSize.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QSGImageNode::setTexture(QSGTexture *texture)
db:section.db:para: Sets the texture of this image node to texture.
Use setOwnsTexture() to set whether the node should take ownership of the texture. By default, the node does not take ownership.

db:warning.db:para: An image node must have a texture before being added to the scenegraph to be rendered.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QSGImageNode::setTextureCoordinatesTransform(QSGImageNode::TextureCoordinatesTransformMode mode)
db:section.db:para: Sets the method used to generate texture coordinates to mode. This can be used to obtain correct orientation of the texture. This is commonly needed when using a third-party OpenGL library to render to texture as OpenGL has an inverted y-axis relative to Qt Quick.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QRectF QSGImageNode::sourceRect() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the source rect of this image node.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QSGTexture *QSGImageNode::texture() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the texture for this image node.
